home.description: Connecting food businesses with community organizations. Turn surplus into impact—whether it's event leftovers, restaurant excess, or grocery overstock.

about.title: About FoodFlow
about.subtitle: Our platform connects food donors with verified organizations to reduce waste and fight hunger through smart technology and community collaboration.

verifiedOrgs.title: Verified Organizations
verifiedOrgs.content: All our partner organizations undergo thorough verification and background checks to ensure safety, legitimacy, and compliance with food safety standards.

realTimeNotifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
realTimeNotifications.content: Instant alerts when food donations become available. Our system tracks temperature, pickup times, and compliance automatically for complete transparency.

smartMatching.title: Smart Matching
smartMatching.content: Our intelligent algorithm matches food type, quantity, and location with the most suitable nearby organization to maximize efficiency and impact.

howItWorks.title: How FoodFlow Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Surplus food reaches charities in minutes, not hours. Our smart matching prevents good food from going to waste.

step1.title: Post Surplus Instantly
step1.text: Restaurants, events, and stores post surplus food with quantity, pickup location, and time window before it spoils.

step2.title: Smart Instant Matching
step2.text: Our algorithm instantly alerts the nearest verified charity, shelter, or volunteer who can pick up within the time window.

step3.title: Tracked Safe Pickup
step3.text: Built-in food safety tracking logs temperature, expiry dates, and pickup times for compliance while ensuring meals reach people fast.

q1.question: How can I use FoodFlow to donate my surplus food?
q1.answer: Donating surplus food through FoodFlow is simple! First, create an account on our platform. Once logged in, you can quickly post available surplus food by providing details like food type, quantity, pickup location, and time window. Nearby charities and community organizations will be instantly notified and can claim the donation.

q2.question: What kind of organizations can receive food through FoodFlow?
q2.answer: FoodFlow works with verified charitable organizations including food banks, homeless shelters, community kitchens, schools, and non-profits serving vulnerable populations. All receiving organizations undergo a verification process to ensure they can properly handle and distribute food according to safety standards.

q3.question: Is there any cost to use FoodFlow?
q3.answer: FoodFlow is completely free for both food donors and receiving organizations. Our mission is to reduce food waste and help communities, so we've designed the platform to be accessible to everyone.

q4.question: How does FoodFlow ensure food safety?
q4.answer: Food safety is our top priority. Our platform includes built-in safety guidelines and tracking features. Donors provide information about storage conditions, preparation time, and expiration dates. We also provide temperature logging for perishable items and ensure all pickups happen within safe time windows.
